data.text: Godou mouli ang gi Christ le e hagamaaloo aga goodou, gei dono aloho le e haga manawa lamalia goodou. Goodou gu hagadaubuni ang gi di Hagataalunga Dabu, gei goodou gu manawa humalia mo di hagadau aaloho i godou mehanga.

Deenei laa, au e hagamahi adu bolo goodou gi haga dohu ina dogu tene gii tugi, mai godou hagamaanadu hua e dahi, mo di aloho hua e dahi, di hagadaubuni hua e dahi, di mouli mo di hagamaanadu hua e dahi.

Goodou hudee heia godou mee mai i godou maanadu bida hagahumalia hua goodou, be mai godou hiihai bolo goodou e hagaamu goodou, gei goodou gi hagadau hila gi lala, duguina digau ala i golo bolo e humalia i goodou.
Goodou gii mmada gi nia hiihai o digau ala i golo, hagalee go godou hiihai la hua.
Goodou e hai loo gi hai mee gi nnagadilinga haihai ala gu hai mee ginai a Jesus Christ:
Mee e hai mee gi nia mahi o God
Mee gu manawa hila gi lala,
Mee guu hai tangada hagalongo,
Malaa, deelaa di mee a God
Nia mee huogodoo ala e mouli i di langi,
Nia daangada huogodoo ga hagamodongoohia aga

Ogu ihoo hagaaloho nei, goodou nogo hagalongo mai gi di au i nia madagoaa huogodoo ala nogo noho iei au i godou baahi. Ma koia e humalia maa goodou ga hagalongo mai gi di au dolomeenei i dogu madagoaa dela e mogowaa loo i goodou. Goodou ngalua hagamahi i lodo godou mmaadagu mo di bolebole, e haga dohu ai godou haga mouli.
Idimaa, God le e ngalua i godou lodo i nia madagoaa huogodoo belee hai goodou gi hiihai ge daudali dono manawa.
Goodou hudee hai tamu be e lagamaaloo i godou mee huogodoo ala ma gaa hai,

gei goodou gaa hai digau e madammaa gadoo be nia dama a God ala koia e humalia, ala e noho i baahi digau huaidu mo digau hai mee hala i henuailala. Goodou gi maahina i baahi digaula, gadoo be nia heduu ala e hagamaahina i di langi2.15 Deuteronomy 32.5

i di godou madagoaa ma gaa wanga gi digaula nia helekai haga mouli. Maa goodou gaa hai beenei, gei au ga hagaamu goodou i di laangi o Christ, idimaa, di mee deenei e haga modongoohia bolo dogu hagamahi mo agu hegau huogodoo la digi balumee.

Maa ogu dodo ne belee hali gadoo be nia wai tigidaumaha i hongo di gowaa hai tigidaumaha dela e hai godou tigidaumaha mai godou hagadonu ang gi God, ma gaa hai beenei, gei au e tenetene madalia goodou huogodoo.
Goodou gi heia labelaa beelaa, goodou e hai gi tenetene madalia au.
Maa di manawa ni God deenei, gei au e hagadagadagagee bolo au e mee di hagau adu a Timothy hagalimalima, gi maaloo ogu lodo i godou longo.
Ma go mee hua dela e hai gadoo be au, dela e haga dahidamee goodou.
Digau huogodoo ala i golo le e bida haga dahidamee hua go nadau mee ala e hai, ge hagalee go nnegau a Jesus Christ.
Goodou e iloo be ana hegau le e dahidamee behee, idimaa, gimaua e hai hegau ngaadahi i di gili di Longo Humalia gadoo be tamana mo dana dama.
Au e hagadagadagagee bolo au ga hagau adu a mee hagalimalima gi goodou i dogu madagoaa ma ga iloo be dehee di mee gaa hai mai.
Au e hagadagadagagee labelaa gi Tagi, bolo au e mee labelaa di hanadu gi godou baahi hoohoo mai.

Au gu hagamaanadu bolo ma e humalia e hagau adu tadau duaahina go Epaphroditus gi godou baahi. Go mee dela nogo ngalua, ge heebagi i dagu baahi ge nogo madalia au, ge dela hogi go di godou dangada kae hegau dela ne hanimoi belee hagamaamaa au.
Mee e hidihidi huoloo bolo ia e mmada adu gi goodou huogodoo, gei mee gu manawa gee i dono longono bolo goodou gu longo bolo ia e magi.
E donu bolo mee nogo magi, gu hoohoo gaa made, gei God gu aloho i mee, mo au labelaa, dela ne haga dagaloaha au gi daha mo tagadilinga manawa gee damana.
Gei au gu hiihai huoloo bolo au e hagau adu a mee, gii mmada goodou gi mee, gi tenetene labelaa goodou, gei dogu manawa gee hogi gaa ngala.
Goodou gi benebene ina a mee i di manawa tene, gii hai be tuaahina ni goodou i di hagadaubuni ang gi Tagi. Goodou hagalabagau ina digau ala e hai be mee,
idimaa, mee e de hagahuodia dono mouli, mee gu hoohoo gaa made, i di gili nnegau a Christ, belee hagamaamaa au i godou mee ala ne deemee di hai.
